pageContext.claim: “Democrats want to disarm law-abiding Americans, while allowing criminal aliens to operate with impunity.”
pageContext.analysis: Many Democrats support new gun-control laws that would enhance background checks when purchasing a gun; there are no proposals to take away guns ("disarm") from Americans. Democrats also do not support allowing undocumented immigrants who have committed criminal acts to "operate with impunity." Many actually support targeting criminals while not diverting resources to going have undocumented immigrants who are law-abiding.
